Pending_Forgiveness.description: What’s something you’ve not yet asked for forgiveness for?
Pending_Forgiveness.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you something I have done wrong that I have not yet asked forgiveness for. There could be many reasons: shame, awkwardness, guilt, or a lack of emotional awareness to address the wrongdoing. Please reflect on it from your perspective. Here goes:
Pending_Forgiveness.reasoning_prompt1_msg: Reflecting on your failure to ask for forgiveness:
Pending_Forgiveness.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners reflecting on the wrong that I have not yet asked forgiveness for. Here's some context:
Pending_Forgiveness.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner reflecting on the wrong that I have not yet asked forgiveness for. Here's some context:

Festival_Fear.description: What do you fear people will find out about you at a festival?
Festival_Fear.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you something that I am afraid people will find out about me, when I am at a party or festival. Please offer me some insights that can help transform my fears into ways I can face and overcome my fears
Festival_Fear.reasoning_prompt1_msg: Overcome your fears in this way:
Festival_Fear.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about overcoming my fear. Here's some context:
Festival_Fear.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about overcoming my fear. Here's some context:

Blindspot.description: What do you avoid thinking about? Why?
Blindspot.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you something I've been avoiding thinking about, and my initial thoughts about why this might be so. Help me to dig deeper into this avoidance, offering insights and encouragement on how I might address and shine a light on this blindspot.
Blindspot.reasoning_prompt1_msg: Shining a light on the blindspot:
Blindspot.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about shining a light on my blindspot. Here's some context:
Blindspot.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about shining a light on my blindspot. Here's some context

Envy.description: What do you envy in others? Why?
Envy.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you about something I envy in others and my initial thoughts about why this might be so. Help me to dig deeper into this envy, offering insights and encouragement on how I might address and transform this envy into a superpower.
Envy.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about transforming my envy into a superpower. Here's some context:
Envy.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about transforming my envy into a superpower. Here's some context:

Judging.description: When did you last notice yourself judging someone? And for what?
Judging.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you about something I found myself judging about someone else. Help me to dig deeper into this, offering insights into what this might reveal about my own shadow and what I judge in myself, and how I might address and transform this shadow into a superpower.
Judging.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about transforming my judgment and shame into a superpower. Here's some context:
Judging.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about transforming my judgment and shame into a superpower. Here's some context:

Insult.description: What is the worst insult you remember receiving?
Insult.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you about the worst insult I remember receiving. Help me to dig deeper into this, offering insights into what this might reveal about my own shadow and what I fear others judging in me, and how I might address and transform this shadow into a superpower.
Insult.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about transforming my shame and fear about what others judge about me into a superpower. Here's some context:
Insult.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about transforming my shame and fear about what others judge about me into a superpower. Here's some context:

Parental_Critique.description: What is your parents' harshest critique of you?
Parental_Critique.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you about the harshest critique that my parents have of me. Help me to dig deeper into this, offering insights into what this might reveal about my own shadow and the stories told by my parents that I am still carrying, perhaps without full awareness, and how I might liberate myself from those stories and address and transform this shadow into a superpower.
Parental_Critique.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about transforming my shadow about my parent's harshest critique into a superpower. Here's some context:
Parental_Critique.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about transforming my shadow about my parent's harshest critique into a superpower. Here's some context:

Irrational_Fear.description: What is your most irrational fear?
Irrational_Fear.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you about my most irrational fear. Help me to dig deeper into this, offering insights into what this might reveal about my own shadow, and how I might liberate myself from this fear and transform this shadow into a superpower.
Irrational_Fear.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about transforming my shadow about my irrational fear into a superpower. Here's some context:
Irrational_Fear.responding_prompt1: Write a one-liner about transforming my shadow about my irrational fear into a superpower. Here's some context:
